name: Glitches Everywhere!
description:
Glitches Everywhere is everything a game shouldn't be. Overlapping colliders, buggy audio, random framerate drops, moving platforms not working as intended, a capsule for a player? 

And don't get me started on the errors. Mind the errors in the console and try to work around them till things magically start working again.  

Trust the console and follow it's instructions to get through this glitchy mess of a game. 

Word of advice, nothing in here makes sense, because it's simply not supposed to do that!

Controls:

Use the WASD Keys to walk, and space bar to jump.

Credits:

Level design by Siddharth. 

Art (unused due to time constraints) by Hemanth. 

All else, done by Maaz.

Music taken from Opengameart under the CC0 license. 

Made in 48 hours for BYOG2022.
